item.title: Disclaimers
item.description: Disclaimers:This application and site includes clinical tools and content intended for use by anesthesia professionals.These information and contentprovided by this application is for informational purposes only and it should not be construed as professional medical advice or professional services.The user must verify all information again, and make adjustments based on individual differences and specific physical conditions of the patient.Under no circumstances shall the developer be liable for any loss, damage, liability or expense incurred or suffered that is claimed to have resulted from the use of this application, including, without limitation, any fault, error, omission, interruption or delay with respect thereto.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Janus built the Anaesthesia Tools app as an Ad Supported app. This SERVICE is provided by Janus at no cost and is intended for use as is. This page is used to inform visitors regarding my policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use my Service. If you choose to use my Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy.
